mapper.sql: SELECT BSR.ID, BSR.SOLD_AT, BSR.SOLD_PRICE, BSR.CUSTOMER_ID, BSR.GROUP_CODE_ID, BSR.COMMON_CODE_ID, BSR.BOOK_OWNER_SETTLEMENT_ID, BSR.RATIO_ID, B.BOOK_OWNER_ID AS BOOK_OWNER_ID, B.BOOK_NAME AS BOOK_NAME, U.NAME AS BOOK_OWNER_NAME, CC.CODE_NAME AS BUY_TYPE_NAME, SR.OWNER_RATIO AS OWNER_RATIO, SR.STORE_RATIO AS STORE_RATIO FROM BOOK_SALE_RECORD BSR JOIN BOOK B ON BSR.ID = B.ID JOIN USERS U ON B.BOOK_OWNER_ID = U.ID JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.GROUP_CODE = BSR.GROUP_CODE_ID AND CC.CODE = BSR.COMMON_CODE_ID JOIN SETTLEMENT_RATIO SR ON BSR.RATIO_ID = SR.ID
mapper.select: WHERE BSR.BOOK_OWNER_SETTLEMENT_ID IS NULL AND B.BOOK_OWNER_ID = #{bookOwnerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_SALE_RECORD (ID, SOLD_AT, SOLD_PRICE, CUSTOMER_ID, GROUP_CODE_ID, COMMON_CODE_ID, BOOK_OWNER_SETTLEMENT_ID, RATIO_ID) VALUES (#{id}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{soldPrice}, #{customerId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{groupCodeId}, #{commonCodeId}, #{bookOwnerSettlementId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ratioId})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT B.BOOK_OWNER_ID FROM BOOK_SALE_RECORD BSR JOIN BOOK B ON BSR.ID = B.ID WHERE BSR.BOOK_OWNER_SETTLEMENT_ID IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_SALE_RECORD BSR JOIN BOOK B ON BSR.ID = B.ID WHERE B.BOOK_CASE_ID = #{bookCaseId} AND BSR.BOOK_OWNER_SETTLEMENT_ID IS NULL
